org.jboss.soa.esb.addressing.eprs
Class FTPEpr

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.soa.esb.addressing.EPR
      org.jboss.soa.esb.addressing.eprs.FileEpr
          org.jboss.soa.esb.addressing.eprs.FTPEpr
Direct Known Subclasses:
FTPSEpr, SFTPEpr
public class FTPEpr
extends FileEpr

A helper class for using FTP style EPRs. Simply create instances of this class instead of the base EPR. Since URLs can use FTP, we try to leverage that as much as possible.

Author:
marklittle
